title: Relative Clauses 2
description: Add the phrase in brackets to the sentence using a relative clause. Use 'that' or no pronoun:

parts.value: She bought the computer (her brother had recommended the computer)

parts.answer: She bought the computer her brother had recommended
answerList: She bought the computer her brother had recommended
She bought the computer that her brother had recommended

parts.value: He lost the money (I had given him the money)

parts.answer: He lost the money I had given him
answerList: He lost the money I had given him
He lost the money that I had given him

parts.value: We called the taxi company (Julie often uses the taxi company)

parts.answer: We called the taxi company Julie often uses
answerList: We called the taxi company Julie often uses
We called the taxi company that Julie often uses

parts.value: John met a girl (I used to employ the girl)

parts.answer: John met a girl I used to employ
answerList: John met a girl I used to employ
John met a girl that I used to employ

parts.value: Lucy called the doctor (my mother knows the doctor)

parts.answer: Lucy called the doctor my mother knows
answerList: Lucy called the doctor my mother knows
Lucy called the doctor that my mother knows

parts.value: He brought a woman (I used to often meet the woman)

parts.answer: He brought a woman I used to often meet
answerList: He brought a woman I used to often meet
He brought a woman that I used to often meet

parts.value: We employed the lawyer (Julie recommended the lawyer)

parts.answer: We employed the lawyer Julie recommended
answerList: We employed the lawyer Julie recommended
We employed the lawyer that Julie recommended

parts.value: The fruit is on the table (I bought the fruit)

parts.answer: The fruit I bought is on the table
answerList: The fruit I bought is on the table
The fruit that I bought is on the table

parts.value: The wallet belongs to John (Lucy found the wallet in the garden)

parts.answer: The wallet Lucy found in the garden belongs to John
answerList: The wallet Lucy found in the garden belongs to John
The wallet that Lucy found in the garden belongs to John

parts.value: The food was delicious (David cooked the food)

parts.answer: The food David cooked was delicious
answerList: The food David cooked was delicious
The food that David cooked was delicious

parts.value: The car was stolen (my father gave me the car)

parts.answer: The car my father gave me was stolen
answerList: The car my father gave me was stolen
The car that my father gave me was stolen

parts.value: The man was arrested (I reported the man to the police)

parts.answer: The man I reported to the police was arrested
answerList: The man I reported to the police was arrested
The man that I reported to the police was arrested

parts.value: The doctor was right (Lucy asked the doctor about her problem)

parts.answer: The doctor Lucy asked about her problem was right
answerList: The doctor Lucy asked about her problem was right
The doctor that Lucy asked about her problem was right

parts.value: The waitress was very pretty (my brother dated the waitress)

parts.answer: The waitress my brother dated was very pretty
answerList: The waitress my brother dated was very pretty

parts.answer: The secretary the boss likes is in the office.
answerList: The secretary the boss likes is in the office.
The secretary that the boss likes is in the office.

parts.answer: We ate the fruit I bought
answerList: We ate the fruit I bought
